to allow the museum to be located in the City of New York and encouraging and developing the study of the fine arts.

TO ENABLE THE MUSEUM to maintains a unique collection of nearly 30,000 works of fine art and broadcast media, as well as educate the public.
TO ENABLE THE PLAYWRIGHT CENTER to support playwrights and promote new plays to production at theaters across the country.

To help The Cultural Councils advocacy efforts cover public policy and funding issues locally, state-wide and nationally, speaking on behalf of the cultural industry and its impact on issues and people.

TO HELP THE FOUNDATION preserve and conserve the historically significant art studio, the sculpture gardens, and the architecture.
To help make a difference in the lives of students, faculty, and the communities where they embody Cornell's mission of creating knowledge with a public purpose.
To enable EMA to improve lives by helping to provide funding for abortions for women and girls who are faced with an unintended or problem pregnancy which they cannot afford to terminate.

To improve medicine for all by connecting CEOs and business leaders with leading hospitals and their doctors to provide the best access to world class care and increase philanthropic funding for medical research.
To enable The members of the Manalapan Police Department to provide the highest level of service to the community.
To help the Garden pursue its mission through its role as a museum of living plant collections arranged in gardens and landscapes across its National Historic Landmark site.
To help the Hudson Opera House inspire and promote the arts and play a pivotal role in the cultural and economic advancement of the region
To enable The Connecticut Foundation for Dental Outreach provide charitable dental care to the underserved and building awareness of the importance of oral healthcare to create a healthier community.
to improve the quality of life of all residents of the Town of Jupiter by providing services to those in need, especially day laborers and their families.
